ValidationRule.description: Checks if the Disbursable Amount field is blank when a Finance Summary with Record Type Endowment Fund Summary is created or updated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED( Disbursable_Amount__c ) ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Endowment_Fund_Summary', OR( ISNULL( Disbursable_Amount__c ), ISBLANK( Disbursable_Amount__c ) ) )
